metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26952 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Incorrect bookkeeping of functions inlined during JIT compilation could have led to memory corruption and a potentially exploitable crash when handling out-of-memory errors. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 83.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '83.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
